articles.title: Week in tech: Aditya L1 set to reach Lagrange point on 6 January - Mint Lounge
articles.description: The Lagrange point 1 will give Isro's Aditya L1 spacecraft an uninterrupted view of the Sun and allow it to study the Sun's corona and Chromosphere
articles.content:
